title: The Godfather
plot_synopsis: The Godfather is a crime epic that chronicles the Corleone family's rise to power in the mafia underworld. Don Vito Corleone, the patriarch of the family, is a powerful and respected crime boss who is known for his loyalty to those who show him respect and his ruthlessness towards those who betray him. As rival gangs and internal conflicts threaten to tear the family apart, Vito's youngest son, Michael, reluctantly steps up to take control of the family business and protect his loved ones at any cost.
